languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} while under the Endure effect, their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 until the Warrior's next turn.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g}, на которого действует эффект Стойкость, получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, его {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} увеличивается на 1 до следующего хода.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Fighter is hit while under the Endure effect, their Damage Deflection is increased by 1 until the Fighter's next turn.
Whenever the Fighter is hit while under the Endure effect, their Damage Deflection is increased by 1 until the Fighter's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда воин, на которого действует эффект Стойкость, получает удар, его отражение урона увеличивается на 1 до следующего хода воина.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}在隐忍待发效果下被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，战士的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就会提高1点，效果持续至战士的下个回合为止。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} while under the Endure effect, their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 until the Warrior's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当战士在隐忍待发效果下被{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}时，战士的伤害{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就会提高1点，效果持续至战士的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}在隐忍待发效果下被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}时，战士的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就会提高1点，效果持续至战士的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} estando bajo los efectos de Aguantar, su puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} aumenta en +1 hasta su próximo turno.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} while under the Endure effect, their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 until the Warrior's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el guerrero reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} estando bajo los efectos de Aguantar, su puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} aumenta en +1 hasta su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird, während er unter dem Effekt Ertragen steht, wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Kriegers um +1 erhöht.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} while under the Endure effect, their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 until the Warrior's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Krieger {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird, während er unter dem Effekt Ertragen steht, wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Kriegers um +1 erhöht.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} est {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touché{/g} alors qu'il bénéficie de l'effet Supporter, la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} augmente de +1 jusqu'à son prochain tour.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} while under the Endure effect, their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 until the Warrior's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le Combattant est {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touché{/g} alors qu'il bénéficie de l'effet Supporter, la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} de ses dégâts augmente de +1 jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: 忍耐効果中の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}に攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}がファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+1される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} is {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} while under the Endure effect, their {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 until the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 忍耐効果中のファイターに攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した場合、そのダメージ{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}がファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+1される。

忍耐効果中の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}に攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}がファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+1される。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, Sebat etkisindeyken {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulursa{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırması{/g} +1 artar. Bu etki, Savaşçı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek sürer.
